Package projects

Class Project

java.lang.Object
projects.Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
es.uam.eps.sadp.grants.GrantRequest, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Infrastructural, Social
public abstract class Project
extends java.lang.Object
implements es.uam.eps.sadp.grants.GrantRequest, java.io.Serializable
This class is the father class of Social and Infrastructural. It contains all the general information about the ideas that the users of the application propose.
Author:
Cesar Ramirez Martinez

    • addFollower

      public boolean addFollower​(User user)
      Method used to add a follower to the followers list of a project.
      Parameters:
      user - User that will be added to the project followers.
      Returns:
      true if adding follower was a success

    • reject

      public Project reject()
      Method used to reject a proposal project. A notification will be sent to all the project followers reporting this decision.
      Returns:
      The project that will be added to the rejected projects list by the application.

    • validate

      public Project validate()
      Method used to validate a proposal project.
      Returns:
      The project that will be added to the public projects list by the application.

    • send

      public boolean send()
      Method used to send to financiation a project that has reached the minimum number of votes established. A notification reporting this decision will be sent to all the project followers.
      Returns:
      true if no problem was found when sending the project

    • support

      public Project support​(Voter voter)
      Method used to add a vote to the project.
      Parameters:
      voter - Voter that will be added to the voters list of the project.
      Returns:
      The project itself.

    • financiate

      public Project financiate​(double budget)
      Method used to financiate a project with a certain amount of money(euros). A notification reporting this decision will be sent to all the project followers.
      Parameters:
      budget - Double that indicates the amount of money that wiil be used to financiate the project.
      Returns:
      The project that will be added to the financiated projects list by the application.

    • countVotes

      public int countVotes()
      Method used to count all the votes that a project has.
      Returns:
      The number of votes that a project has got.

    • hasExpired

      public boolean hasExpired​(int maxInactivity)
      Method used to check if a project has expired since the it recieved its last vote. We obtain todays day and we subtract the day of the last vote. If the result is greater than maxInactivity it will have expired.
      Parameters:
      maxInactivity - Integer that indicates the max number of days that a project can remain public without receiving any support.
      Returns:
      True if the project has expired. False otherwise.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
